title: What does 'agentic' AI mean? Tech's newest buzzword is a mix of marketing fluff and real promise
description: For technology adopters looking for the next big thing, “agentic AI” is the future. At least, that's what the marketing pitches and tech industry T-shirts say. What makes an artificial intelligence product “agentic” depends on who's selling it. But the promise is usually that it's a step beyond today's generative…
content:

title: The Teddy Bear Said What? And Other Dispatches From the AI Frontier
description: From creepy toys to fake evidence, artificial intelligence is raising urgent ethical and legal questions.
content: The race to embrace artificial intelligence for its promise of unrivaled productivity may not be a conventional political story. But implementing it without proper guardrails raises an array of issues that will no doubt demand a public policy respons... [3858 chars]

title: AI: Ignorance, Unrestricted Use Not Bliss
description: As an educator, this writer has grave concerns regarding academic use and plagiarism, as well as the loss of critical thinking happening through AI (Artificial Intelligence).
content:
The lines are increasingly being crossed between the importance of HI (Human Intelligence) and AI (Artificial Intelligence).
Looking at these issues in technology right now. some points to consider:

title: AI-focused developers help fuel New York City life, city agency chief says
description: New York City companies focused on artificial intelligence, which rely on human interaction to grow, are boosting office leasing and inspiring the return of workers to the city, said Andrew Kimball, president and CEO of New York City Economic Development Corporation.

title: AI set to redefine shopping and payments, Affirm CEO says
description: * Agentic AI to eliminate predatory business models, Levchin says * BNPL market grew 9.9% in 2024, Adobe Analytics reports * Composable solutions key for retail success in AI era, Levchin argues By Hannah Lang Nov 19 (Reuters) - Max Levchin, CEO and co-founder of Affirm, which offers buy now, pay later plans, said artificial intelligence is poised to transform shopping by taking over human tasks and making financial products more transparent.

title: Rubio, Saudis Call AI Pact 'Historic Step' in New Tech Alliance
description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio and Saudi Foreign Minister Prince Faisal bin Farhan announced in a joint statement Wednesday that they've signed a sweeping Strategic Artificial Intelligence Partnership, calling it a historic step that sets a new milestone in the U.S.-Saudi alliance.
